name: Refugia - GGJ23 Submission
description:
REFUGIA is a game where you paint vegetation
to stop evil robots from cutting down the Mother Tree!
Will it survive until time runs out?

refugia - noun, pl.
an area in which a population of organisms can survive
through a period of unfavorable conditions.

~~~~~~~~~~~

The world has been devastated by the Rootatillers, robots bent on uprooting all plant life across the planet. There are only a few areas protected by Mother Trees remaining. With our Robotic Tree-Painting Suits, we can slow down and stop those evil machines!

WASD to move

SPACE to dash

LEFT CLICK to paint vegetation, using fuel

RIGHT CLICK to delete vegetation to get back fuel

Rootatillers will OVERHEAT and EXPLODE as they cut down more trees.
Rootatillers can only hurt trees.

Stop them before they get to the Mother Tree!!

~~~~~~~~~~~

Refugia was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023.
